item.title: Demand for Official Apple Devices Rises in Bangladesh Amid Growing Warranty Awareness
item.description: The consumer technology landscape in Bangladesh is undergoing a sophisticated evolution. For years, the market for premium electronics, particularly the Apple ecosystem, was a "wild west" of grey-market imports and unverified sellers. However, as the digital economy matures, a significant shift in consumer psychology is taking place. Today’s buyers are no longer just looking for a device; they are seeking reliability, authenticity, and the long-term security provided by genuine Apple products......
